txt.en: Kergrim can be found at Dáru Lagúrz in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should defeat kergrim at Dáru Lagúrz.
Kergrim can be found at Dáru Lagúrz in Rath Dúath.\n\nYou should defeat kergrim at Dáru Lagúrz.

At the Broken Houses of Dáru Lagúrz, the kergrim have defiled a sacred place housing the resting dead. Now it is a place the beasts have dedicated to foul rituals and sacrifice, and the beasts gather here in defiance of the solemn peace that once blanketed the houses. The kergrim here must be defeated or they will continue their foul practices.

You have defeated hosts of kergrim in Dáru Lagúrz, for now putting an end to their foul practices. They will likely return, but your deeds this day may cause them to hesitate before they come back and break the peace of the dead. One day of rest for the dead of Gondor, hard-bought, is still a victory worth celebrating.
Defeated hosts of kergrim at Dáru Lagúrz.
The Kergrim of the Morgul Vale have taken control of the old burial houses Gondor had once constructed for Minas Ithil.
